name: Extreme Adventure
description:
Contains 13 Level. Just jump through the obstacle course like parkour and dont fall in water. In level one to seven you must find the wooden door, In level eight to eleven you must find the 1st trophy for win. Press "L" for back to Level Scene Controls: WASD for move, Space Bar for Jump and Shift for Run

All Background Music by bebeto (freesound)

Link: https://freesound.org/people/bebeto/
